title: Godrej Park Retreat
description:
Godrej Park Retreat is a futuristic residential project by the Godrej Properties off Sarjapur Road in Bangalore. This apartment complex Park Retreat consists of 800 Plus houses. The new launch is among the most awaited projects by Godrej.

Sarjapur Road hosts some of the best apartment complexes in east Bangalore. There are many IT companies. It is a rapidly growing area. With this pre-launch luxury flat on Sarjapur road, Godrej will create another landmark.
